markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Recognize Threat](/Feats.aspx?ID=1127) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)

**Prerequisites**
master in a [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) skill; [Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871)

**Access**
A character who is a member of the Pathfinder Society has access to this option.

**Trigger**
Your first turn of an encounter begins, and you can see a creature.

**Requirements**
You have master proficiency in a skill to identify the triggering creature.

</column>

---

You quickly assess the threat so you can relay the information to your team. Attempt a Recall Knowledge check against the triggering creature.
